verbose_text: MBP with antibiotics, hospital staff training and entry-exit management of operation theater significantly reduce surgical site infection, postoperative complications (Clavien Dindo stage III-V) and duration of hospital stay [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: MBP with antibiotics, hospital staff training and entry-exit management of operation theater significantly reduce surgical site infection, postoperative complications (Clavien Dindo stage III-V) and duration
